entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player object for the game play Contains attributes for a single player, such as id, owned country number, color, armies to place as well as methods to alter these attributes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Empty constructor for Player Creates a player with the id: "DNE"
      Player(java.lang.String id, java.awt.Color color)
      Proper constructor for Player Initializes player with input id and Color

      • initializeStartupArmy

        public void initializeStartupArmy(int playersize)
        At the start of startup phase, this method is called to give players an initial amount of army To place one at a time in round-robin fashion
        Parameters:
        playersize - number of players

        public void increaseCountry(int i)
        Increments the number of countries that the player owns
        Parameters:
        i - number of countries to increase

      • decreaseCountry

        public boolean decreaseCountry()
        When a player loses ownership of a country, the totalCountryNum is decreased. When the player no longer have at least 1 country, the player loses, this function returns true
        Returns:
        true if player lost, false if player still has at least 1 country remaining

      • extraArmyToAdd

        public int extraArmyToAdd()
        During phase one, when a player owns all countries in this Continent, player will be rewarded an additional army equivalent to the continent's value
        Returns:
        total army bonus to add due to owned continents
